class Stream s where

  • type Chunk s

  • tokensToChunk :: proxy s -> [Token s] -> Chunk s
  • chunkLength :: proxy s -> Chunk s -> Int
  • chunkNull :: proxy s -> Chunk s -> Bool
  • foldChunk :: proxy s -> (b -> Token s -> b) -> b -> Chunk s -> b

  • updatePosChunk :: proxy s -> Chunk s -> Pos -> Pos
name: Stream Chunk Token streamUncons streamSplitAt tokensToChunk streamSpan chunkToTokens chunkLength chunkNull foldChunk updatePosToken updatePosChunk

display_html:
data Unexpected s
  • = UnexpectedToken (Token s)
  • | UnexpectedChunk (Chunk s)
  • | UnexpectedEnd
  • | UnexpectedEmpty
name: Unexpected UnexpectedToken UnexpectedChunk UnexpectedEnd UnexpectedEmpty

display_html:
data Message e
  • = MessageCustom e
  • | MessageFail String
name: Message MessageCustom MessageFail

display_html:
data ErrorItem s e l
  • = ErrorItemLabels (Unexpected s) [l]
  • | ErrorItemMessages [Message e]
name: ErrorItem ErrorItemLabels ErrorItemMessages

display_html:
data ParseError s e l = ParseError {
  • parseErrorPos :: !Pos
  • parseErrorOffset :: !Int
  • parseErrorItem :: ErrorItem s e l
}
name: ParseError ParseError parseErrorPos parseErrorOffset parseErrorItem

display_html:
class (Stream s, MonadPlus m) => MonadParser s e l m | m -> s e l where
  • matchToken :: (Maybe (Token s) -> Either (ErrorItem s e l) a) -> m a
  • matchTokens :: Int -> (Chunk s -> Either (ErrorItem s e l) a) -> m a
  • matchTokenWhile :: (Token s -> Bool) -> (Chunk s -> Either (ErrorItem s e l) a) -> m a
  • endOfInput :: m ()
  • withLabel :: Maybe l -> m a -> m a
  • try :: m a -> m a
  • lookAhead :: m a -> m a
  • notFollowedBy :: m a -> m ()
  • recover :: (ParseError s e l -> m a) -> m a -> m a
  • observing :: m a -> m (Either (ParseError s e l) a)
  • parseError :: ParseError s e l -> m a
  • getState :: m (State s)
  • putState :: State s -> m ()
name: MonadParser try getState recover lookAhead matchToken matchTokens matchTokenWhile endOfInput withLabel notFollowedBy observing parseError putState

newtype ParserT s e l m a = ParserT {
  • unParserT :: Continuations s e l m a
}

display_html: type Parser s e l = ParserT s e l Identity
name: Parser

display_html: type ThenOk s l m a r = a -> [l] -> State s -> m r
name: ThenOk

display_html: type ThenErr s e l m r = ParseError s e l -> State s -> m r
name: ThenErr

display_html: type Continuations s e l m a = forall r. State s -> ThenOk s l m a r -> ThenErr s e l m r -> ThenOk s l m a r -> ThenErr s e l m r -> m r
name: Continuations
